Traditions.Name: Theurgic
Traditions.Description: Theurgic magic originates from divine favor and the power granted by celestial beings or deities. This magic flows through devoted clerics, priests, and paladins who act as conduits for their chosen deity's will. Theurgic magic is limited by the character's devotion and alignment with their deity's values.

Spells.Name: Healing Light
Spells.Description: Restore (1d6 + caster level) health to an ally.

Spells.Name: Divine Shield
Spells.Description: Create a radiant barrier around an ally, reducing incoming damage by 1d4 for 3 rounds.

Spells.Name: Bless
Spells.Description: Bolster the combat abilities of up to 3 allies, granting +1 to attack and defense rolls for 1 minute.

Spells.Name: Turn Undead
Spells.Description: Repel undead within 30 feet; affected undead must pass a Will save (DC 10 + caster level) or flee for 2 rounds.

Spells.Name: Sacred Flame
Spells.Description: Call down holy fire, dealing 1d8 radiant damage. The damage increases by 1d8 for every 2 levels above 1.

Spells.Name: Cure Affliction
Spells.Description: Remove one disease or poison effect. On a successful roll (DC 12 + affliction severity), heal for an additional 1d4.

Spells.Name: Sanctuary
Spells.Description: Prevent enemies from targeting an ally for 3 rounds. Targets may attempt a Will save (DC 12 + caster level) to bypass the effect.

Spells.Name: Divine Wrath
Spells.Description: Deal 3d8 radiant damage in a 20-ft radius. Enemies may save for half damage (DC 14 + caster level).

Spells.Name: Greater Restoration
Spells.Description: Fully restore health and remove all negative conditions from an ally. Heal for 4d6 + caster level.

Spells.Name: Shield of Faith
Spells.Description: Grant an ally +2 to AC for 5 rounds. The effect increases by +1 every 3 levels.

Spells.Name: Command Undead
Spells.Description: Dominate up to 3 lesser undead (CR equal to or lower than caster level) for 5 rounds.

Spells.Name: Holy Nova
Spells.Description: Release a 30-ft wave, healing allies for 2d8 and dealing 2d8 radiant damage to undead.

Spells.Name: Divine Intervention
Spells.Description: On a successful prayer (DC 15 + caster level), invoke direct aid from a deity, granting advantage on all rolls for 1 minute.

Spells.Name: Resurrection
Spells.Description: Return a fallen ally to life with 50% health. Healing increases to full if cast within 1 hour of death.

Spells.Name: Celestial Guardian
Spells.Description: Summon an angelic warrior for 5 rounds. The guardian attacks twice (2d10 radiant damage per attack) and can shield one ally.

Spells.Name: Searing Light
Spells.Description: Fire a beam of sunlight, dealing 6d8 radiant damage and dispelling magical darkness within 60 ft.

Spells.Name: Wrath of the Heavens
Spells.Description: Call down 3 bolts of divine lightning (4d10 damage each). Each bolt may target different enemies.

Spells.Name: Divine Fortress
Spells.Description: Create a 20-ft radius holy ground, granting +3 AC and 2d6 healing per round for 1 minute.

Spells.Name: Judgment
Spells.Description: Channel divine energy to deal 8d10 radiant damage to a single target. The target may attempt a save (DC 18 + caster level) for half damage.

Traditions.Name: Arcane
Traditions.Description: Arcane magic stems from the manipulation of ambient magical energies that permeate the world. This magic is accessed through rigorous study, mental discipline, and the mastery of ancient texts or forgotten lore. Arcane casters, such as wizards and sorcerers, rely on intelligence and precision to control these forces.

Spells.Name: Magic Missile
Spells.Description: Fire 3 magical bolts, each dealing 1d4+ caster level damage. Gain an additional bolt at levels 3, 6, 9, 12, and 15.

Spells.Name: Shield
Spells.Description: Absorb 1d6 damage per caster level until depleted.

Spells.Name: Burning Hands
Spells.Description: Project a 15-ft cone of fire, dealing 3d6 fire damage. Targets may save (DC 12 + caster level) for half damage.

Spells.Name: Mage Armor
Spells.Description: Increase target's AC by +3 for 1 hour.

Spells.Name: Arcane Sight
Spells.Description: Detect magical auras and enchantments within 60 ft for 10 minutes.

Spells.Name: Illusory Disguise
Spells.Description: Create a minor illusion for 1 hour, disguising the caster or an ally.

Spells.Name: Feather Fall
Spells.Description: Slow falling speed to prevent all fall damage for up to 5 creatures.

Spells.Name: Fireball
Spells.Description: Deal 6d6 fire damage in a 20-ft radius. Targets may save (DC 14 + caster level) for half damage.

Spells.Name: Counterspell
Spells.Description: On a reaction, negate a spell being cast (DC equals the spell's level + 10).

Spells.Name: Blink
Spells.Description: Teleport randomly up to 30 ft each round for 5 rounds.

Spells.Name: Wall of Ice
Spells.Description: Create a 30-ft long, 10-ft high wall that lasts for 10 minutes or until destroyed (HP 50).

Spells.Name: Invisibility
Spells.Description: Turn a creature invisible for 1 minute or until they attack/cast a spell.

Spells.Name: Lightning Bolt
Spells.Description: Strike enemies in a 30-ft line, dealing 5d8 lightning damage. Save for half (DC 13 + caster level).

Spells.Name: Meteor Swarm
Spells.Description: Summon 4 meteors, each dealing 8d6 fire damage in a 20-ft radius. Targets may save (DC 18 + caster level) for half.

Spells.Name: Teleportation
Spells.Description: Instantly transport up to 6 allies to a known location.

Spells.Name: Arcane Storm
Spells.Description: Deal 5d10 arcane damage over a 40-ft radius. Effects persist for 3 rounds.

Spells.Name: Time Stop
Spells.Description: Gain 2 extra turns during which time is frozen.

Spells.Name: Summon Elemental
Spells.Description: Summon a large elemental (CR 10) for 10 rounds.

Spells.Name: Disintegrate
Spells.Description: Deal 10d6 damage to a single target. On a failed save (DC 18 + caster level), the target is reduced to ash.
